mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbti_memo (MEMO_NAME, MEMO_AGE, MEMO_SEX, MEMO_RELATION,MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE, MBTI,DEVICE_PK) VALUES (#{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{relation},now(), #{mbti},#{devicePk})
mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_PK , DEVICE_ID FROM device WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId}
SELECT MEMO_ID , MEMO_NAME , MEMO_AGE , MEMO_SEX , MEMO_RELATION , MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE , MBTI , DEVICE_PK FROM mbti_memo WHERE DEVICE_PK = #{deviceId} AND MEMO_ID = #{memoId}

SELECT A.DEVICE_PK, A.DEVICE_ID, B.MEMO_ID, B.DEVICE_PK, B.MEMO_NAME, B.MEMO_AGE, B.MEMO_SEX, B.MEMO_RELATION, B.MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE, B.MBTI, C.code_value AS INTEREST, E.file_url AS profileImageUrl FROM device A JOIN mbti_memo B ON A.DEVICE_PK = B.DEVICE_PK LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.MEMO_ID, b.code_value FROM mbti_interest a INNER JOIN code_data b ON a.INTEREST = b.code_value WHERE b.code_id = ( SELECT MIN(b2.code_id) FROM mbti_interest a2 INNER JOIN code_data b2 ON a2.INTEREST = b2.code_value WHERE a2.MEMO_ID = a.MEMO_ID ) ) C ON B.MEMO_ID = C.MEMO_ID LEFT JOIN upload_file E ON B.MBTI = E.mbti WHERE A.DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId}
